summary: This is an email from the DOJ's voicemail system forwarding a voice message to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims notification list. The message was sent on August 1, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and death.

persons.name: Postmaster
persons.context: The sender of the automated email from the DOJ's voicemail system forwarding a voice message.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded to Epstein Victims Notification List
events.description: A voice message was forwarded via email to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims notification list.

keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York maintained an email distribution list specifically for Epstein victims (USANYS-EpsteinVictims).
A voice message was forwarded to this list on August 1, 2019, which was shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019 and his death in August 2019.
The document shows official DOJ communication channels being used to communicate with Epstein victims.
The voice message content itself is not included in this metadata, only the forwarding email.
The email originated from the DOJ's voicemail system (voip.usa.doj.gov).
